attributes.action: make homelessness illegal and increase national minimum wage
attributes.additional_details: the workforce is not respecting peoples independence by paying really low wages and causing people to be in toxic relationships all for rent whilst people give birth to children they would have never had, all because the national working wages was too low and forced them in to relationships and pressured them in to becoming parents due to high rent control!
attributes.background: I would like to advise that the uk government to make homelessness illegal so that the uk government can increase national working wages so that people can afford to rent homes without having to pervert themselves in to relationships to afford rent.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign these petitions which call for similar action: 

Abolish National Minimum Wage & enforce National Living Wage For All Ages - https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/735331

Raise the minimum wage across the UK and keep pace with inflation - https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/731569
